item.description:
I have revised this calendar on Friday night.

Get Smart (PG-13)
1hr 50min

Time Choices are
6:30, 7:00, 7:45, 9:30, 10:15, 12:05am, 12:35am

I would like to try for the 7:00 show.

So I will ask members and guests to meet by the top of the esculator by 6:45 or so.

I will be having dinner near the Lotus Restaurant.
Members can either come early and join me or just meet me
At the top of the esculator.

westfield.com/connecticutpost/ourstores/details/27418/

http://westfield.com/...

Yeung's Lotus Express
Store FC-10
Categories: Food Court,
Telephone: 203-783-0880
Level 2

I am an Anne Hathaway fan anyways so I look forward to her comedies.

From her website talking about Get Smart.

Talking about Get Smart, Steve and even Duane Johnson told me that the most important
thing was to play it straight. When you re working around these funny people, isn t that hard?

Oh, you have no idea. There are a few shots in the movie that you can tell I am about to go.
And it s funny the things that you wind up doing to keep yourself from laughing.
You just all of a sudden become very interested in your wristwatch.
Or you suddenly just need to bite a knuckle, but like pretend that you re doing it in anger.
There were definitely moments like that.

http://annehathawayfa...

annehathawayfan.com/

Here are some more links for 2008 Get Smart;

A.

http://www.imdb.com/t...

www.imdb.com/title/tt0425061/

B.

http://getsmartmovie....


getsmartmovie.warnerbros.com/

C.
http://en.wikipedia.o...)

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Get_Smart_(film)

D.
http://www.movieweb.c...


www.movieweb.com/movies/film/93/4793/summary.php

E.

Look at this site after June 20 to
Read their review of the movie.

http://www.wafflemovi...

www.wafflemovies.com/

If you are going to see Get Smart some other time and place, then
Please let us know so we can make it into a Meet Up Event.

Happy Summer Blockbuster Viewing.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at top of esculator on left hand side 15 minutes before Movie.
item.why: Who wants to see a great comedy on a Saturday night.
item.name: Coffee Talk Gets Smart in Milford on June 28
